line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Checks $ship equipment and returns information
* Used to collect minerals/wares and to buy or sell goods
* Transport Device is used to collect fighter drones
* Carrier software is used to coordinate drone activity.
* Collecting wares feature is a special command
* Supplying the homebase with up to N amount of items
* Trade Command MK3 software are required
* Needs to be able to find enemies up to a certain distance.
* Processes and refines the ore collected by the drones.

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Checks $ship equipment and returns information
Used to collect minerals/wares and to buy or sell goods
Transport Device is used to collect fighter drones
Carrier software is used to coordinate drone activity.
Collecting wares feature is a special command
Supplying the homebase with up to N amount of items
Trade Command MK3 software are required
Needs to be able to find enemies up to a certain distance.
Processes and refines the ore collected by the drones.
